snippet: The full unclassified report by Army Lt. Col. Daniel L. Davis to Congress and the Pentagon elaborating his claims that senior military leaders are not being honest about how badly the war in Afghanistan is going.
abstract: The full unclassified report by Army Lt. Col. Daniel L. Davis to Congress and the Pentagon elaborating his claims that senior military leaders are not being honest about how badly the war in Afghanistan is going.
lead_paragraph: Army Lt. Col. Daniel L. Davis, who returned in October from his second deployment in Afghanistan, set off a vigorous debate inside and outside the military last week with a provocative article in Armed Forces Journal arguing that military leaders have failed to tell the truth about how badly the war is going. He made multiple appearances on radio and TV; his views were debated on the House floor; and many other officers spoke out, on At War and elsewhere, to commend or condemn him.
